snippet.title: Loopido - A minimalistic platform puzzle game [STEAM - Nintendo Switch - PlayStation - Xbox]
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam (PC, MAC) ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/3301210/Loopido/

Loopidio is currently in development but will be released on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation and Xbox.

⭕Loopido is a minimalistic platform puzzle game where you need to get a ball through a warp field 🧲 Depending on the game mode you either control the ball or the world. 

#PrettyFlyGames #Indiegame #MadeWithUnity
